newsitem.title: USA: Price Comms to buy Palmer Wireless.
newsitem.headline: Price Comms to buy Palmer Wireless.

text.p: Price Communications Corp has reached a definitive agreement to acquire Palmer Wireless Inc for $17.50 cash per share, for an aggregate purchase price of $880 million, including repayment of debt, Palmer said Friday.
Palmer said it expects the transaction to close in the fourth quarter.
